name: Pogo Sky
description:
Take to the skies with nothing but your quick reactions and a sweet POGO stick! Battle your way through an increasingly tough terrain; bouncing, swerving and souring through an endless world of colors, shapes and surprises.

Most people can’t get past 100. How far can you Pogo?

- Simple controls
- Compete on global leaderboards!
- Two game modes!
- BIG selection of Pogo sticks
- Challenge friends via Game Center
- Hours of endless fun
- New content added regularly

The stunts in the game are performed by professional Pogo Sticks and we do not recommend attempting them in real life!

Be sure to follow Part Time Monkey on Facebook and Twitter to get updates on updates and new games:

https://www.facebook.com/parttimemonkey
https://twitter.com/parttimemonkey
